# specline-archive (EN)

Before archiving `{change_id}` confirm:
- tasks.md has no unchecked items (note evidence if any remain)
- summary of deltas to apply (added/modified/removed requirements) and docs to update
- validation/verification commands have passed (cite timestamps)
- final command list to run (`specline archive {change_id}`, git commit, tagging, etc.)
- release notes or follow-up tickets required post-archive
